Sql.query: insert into cpa_insumo ( cpainscodi, cparcodi, cpainstipinsumo, cpainstipproceso, cpainslog, cpainsusucreacion, cpainsfeccreacion ) values ( :cpainscodi, :cparcodi, :cpainstipinsumo, :cpainstipproceso, :cpainslog, :cpainsusucreacion, :cpainsfeccreacion )

update cpa_insumo set cpainscodi = :cpainscodi, cparcodi = :cparcodi, cpainstipinsumo = :cpainstipinsumo, cpainstipproceso = :cpainstipproceso, cpainslog = :cpainslog, cpainsusucreacion = :cpainsusucreacion, cpainsfeccreacion = :cpainsfeccreacion where cpainscodi = :cpainscodi
select cpainscodi, cparcodi, cpainstipinsumo, cpainstipproceso, cpainslog, cpainsusucreacion, cpainsfeccreacion from cpa_insumo order by cpainscodi asc
select cpainscodi, cparcodi, cpainstipinsumo, cpainstipproceso, cpainslog, cpainsusucreacion, cpainsfeccreacion from cpa_insumo where cpainscodi = :cpainscodi
select cpainscodi, cparcodi, cpainstipinsumo, cpainstipproceso, cpainslog, cpainsusucreacion, cpainsfeccreacion from cpa_insumo where (-1 = {0} or cpainscodi = {0})

select cpainscodi, cparcodi, cpainstipinsumo, cpainstipproceso, cpainslog, cpainsusucreacion, cpainsfeccreacion from cpa_insumo where cparcodi = {0} and cpainstipinsumo = '{1}' order by cpainscodi desc
